title: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi Weiji Pojin
synopsis: In the new year, Dousi and his partners ushered in spring again, and there must be new adventures in the new year. In order to maintain the purity and beauty of the prairie, everyone has a lot to do. Thirty episodes are organized around thirty grassland environmental protection knowledge points, allowing the audience to fully understand the beautiful prairie in the fun of appreciating humorous stories and learn a wealth of knowledge that they could not learn before. Of course the efforts of Dousi and his friends have not been smooth sailing. Those cunning and arrogant bad guys will still show up to make troubles from time to time. But then again, if the two pistachios of the big wolf and the ghost fox are missing on this grassland, I am afraid that there will be less Lose a lot of fun. (translated from iqiyi)

Prequel.name: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi Shenmi Guodu
